name: Question
description: A specific question - e.g. from a user seeking answers online, or collected in a Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) document.
title: Question

fields.name: upvoteCount
fields.title: upvoteCount
fields.description: The number of upvotes this question, answer or comment has received from the community.

fields.name: answerCount
fields.title: answerCount
fields.description: The number of answers this question has received.

fields.name: acceptedAnswer
fields.title: acceptedAnswer
fields.description: The answer that has been accepted as best, typically on a Question/Answer site. Sites vary in their selection mechanisms, e.g. drawing on community opinion and/or the view of the Question author.

fields.name: suggestedAnswer
fields.title: suggestedAnswer
fields.description: An answer (possibly one of several, possibly incorrect) to a Question, e.g. on a Question/Answer site.

fields.name: downvoteCount
fields.title: downvoteCount
fields.description: The number of downvotes this question, answer or comment has received from the community.
